column5: KNOWING THE WATERS ARE SUPER CLEAR AND LOW I HEADED OUT AT 3AM WITH GUMP! WAS A SLOW COLD GO BUT WE MANAGED A FEW IN THE DARK AND SOME IN THE EARLY MORN!!PUT IN SOME MAJOR FOOT WORK TOO!! I WENT 4/6 AND GUMP MANGAED 3/4!! NEED TO DO A RAIN DANCE  LOL

Pretty steel, Scott  Thank you for sharing.  If this weather keeps up, it's going to make for a very slow opener, all fish will have reach the head waters, spawned and back to the big O.  Happy New Year John
i think im gonna be sick, cuz those are some ill pics.  Nice one.
nice pics CC and NIIIIIICE fish thanks for the post   Gerritt.
Nice fish CC. Man seeing all those nice trout just wants me to get out real bad. Haha i get to go out tomorrow to chase some steelies.   jordan
great report,  and very nice pics of those awsome silver bulletts...  gotta love those pretty bows
Yup for sure nice fish way to go CC

Great pics, those are beautiful trout.  Not a shot at Bojangles, who also posts great trout reports, but I'd rather see pics with no background or water only than the photoshopped backgrounds (though he does them really well).  Mike
TX EVERYONE!!! LET THE RAIN DANCE BEGIN
Very nice pics, the one with the water looks awsome wtg on the fish
Beautiful looking fish as always CC. Thanks for the post!
Whooooo whee!!! gotta love it, good work C_C, great pic's...
CC how do you do it?  Ive been fishin for 2 months in the cold and only have 2 shakers and 2 lost steels to show for it.
ANYTIME YOUR FREE KEMPER JUST DROP ME A PM AND I'LL BE GLAD TO TAKE YA OUT!!! IM IN THE SHWA SO YA AINT TOO FAR  LOL A DD TIMMIES IS MY FEE  LOL
